tag_list: dantonio, circleme, beintoo, cascaad, google, dada, manhattan-associates, mobile, insead, gamification, rewards
overview:
Giuseppe D’Antonio is CEO of Cascaad, an enthusiast about technology and an angel investor.

Giuseppe has matured technology related experience while working at Manhattan Associates (supply chain software company) since the early stages of the company and up to becoming world market leader for best-of-breed solution provider.

His career and Internet experience matured while at Google, in the Strategic Partnerships team, and at Dada (public company, Italy) as Director of the online advertising division.

In 2010 Giuseppe joined Cascaad, as director of business development.

He is one of the early investors in Beintoo (www.beintoo.com), an innovative API platform for apps developers and a web application for their end users which wants to become THE reputation and rewarding engine for all Apps, included web apps (through the â€œgamificationâ€ of the user experience).

Giuseppe is Italian and permanent resident of the USA. His experience includes 14 years of life abroad, including USA, UK, Singapore, France and Switzerland. He has a background in Engineering from Purdue University and an MBA from INSEAD.
